---
title: "Talk at Stowers Institute"
author: "Ranny Ribeiro"
date: "2024-10-24"
categories: [news]
---

Today, I had the privilege of presenting my research during the Stowers Research Conference on **Developmental Cell Biology***.* In this research, I explored sex differences during gametogenesis in *Platynereis dumerilii* using RNA sequencing. We uncovered that sex-biased gene expression becomes more pronounced during advanced developmental stages. Learn more about the novel genes we discovered and explore our [pre-print](https://doi.org/10.1101/2024.06.12.598746) for additional details.
